description:
Muku (無垢, meaning "Purity" in Japanese) is a sentient sword wielded by http://anidb.net/ch141689 [Tennouji Ai]. It has the power to know the feelings of those who touch it and can also guide them toward the correct path.
During the fight against Utsuro it reached out to http://anidb.net/ch126218 [Shy] and manifested in her mind in a human form.
It has an "evil" counterpart, named Kyomu (虚無, "Nihil"), which is wielded by http://anidb.net/ch141692 [Utsuro].
name: Muku
